short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy way to edit images on Lunapic.com. Right-click an image and open edit session on Lunapic.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Edit images easily with Lunapic.com.  This extension adds a right click option to images to easily edit with Lunapic.  Create animations, add effects, or just crop and save.
